ing: 1 (15 ounce) can pineapple chunks with juice
1 orange - peeled, diced and juice reserved
des: "It's the pineapple syrup combined with the juice of the orange that makes the taste!"
ins: In a large bowl, toss together the pineapple, apple, orange, banana and grapes.  Add the juice from the pineapple and orange and let chill until serving.
